results.content:
The Entrepreneurship For Engineers: Master Business & Marketing
This is a great course by Alex Genadinik to help people at all levels. I am not very technically savvy but I took this course because Alex has developed successful apps for business planning and business development. Taking this course has given me insight and ideas on how to take my insurance business to another level.

results.content: I feel much better equipped to run my business with the help of this instructor. There is a lot of great advice here and I highly recommend the course.
results.content_html: I feel much better equipped to run my business with the help of this instructor. There is a lot of great advice here and I highly recommend the course.

results.content: Thank you Alex for providing this very in depth course for engineers and marketers alike! There is a lot of very useful information and knowledge here, I can really tell how much dedication you have put into this course, I just wanted to thank you personally in this review because this course is really helping me get a better grasp on how I can apply all of these techniques to my online web business that I am currently working on. I hope other individuals who take this course get as much out of it that I did! 8 -, + hours of really useful content, and this course is very affordable as well. Alex has a very friendly personality that keeps his content engaging and fun all around! Lot's to take away from this course! Thank you, again Alex!!!

response.content: Thank you Angel! It is indeed nice to read such a review and I am very happy that the course is helping you :)

results.content: Great course!  I feel much more prepared to run my business after taking Alex’s course.  It was very clear & easy to follow with so many tips that I hadn’t thought of before!  Highly recommend!

results.content:
Your course is exactly what I needed to hear, someone with a technical background has been through the hustle of monetizing ideas over and over again, and managed to master it. It is not only reinforcing my existing knowledge of business, but also expanding my knowledge, as you show every aspect to take into consideration, the common pitfalls, and what I love the most, how to avoid your own bullshit.

I bought your course on sale (sorry), but the value I'm getting from it is invaluable. I feel like by the end of it I can make my ideas come to life without only hoping for the best, but controling every aspect of the monetization process so I know exactly where I am, what tools I can use, what tools I need to use, and where to go from there.

Thanks for the amazing course, and I really appreciate the attention you give to students so you can improve it. Honestly, for me it's perfect already.
